'''"Molten Lava Pool"''' is a creatable [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for "Molten Lava Pool" is available from the [[Natlan Fishing Association]] for {{Item|Diving Rapidfighting Fish|x=3}}, {{Item|Floral Rapidfighting Fish|x=3}} and {{Item|Pseudoshark Unihornfish|x=4}}.

==Creation==
First time creation grants {{Item|Trust|24|x=90}}.

|time = 16h
